pkgmetadata.longdescription: Search, Composite, and Download 'Google Earth Engine' Imagery with the 'Python' Module 'geedim' // Search, composite, and download 'Google Earth Engine' imagery with 'reticulate' bindings for the 'Python' module 'geedim'. Read the 'geedim' documentation here: https://geedim.readthedocs.io/. Wrapper functions are provided to make it more convenient to use 'geedim' to download images larger than the 'Google Earth Engine' size limit https://developers.google.com/earth- engine/apidocs/ee-image-getdownloadurl. By default the "High Volume" API endpoint https://developers.google.com/earth- engine/cloud/highvolume is used to download data and this URL can be customized during initialization of the package.
